title: It's Only A Test | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: It's Only A Test | Joel Osteen
description:
When we face uncomfortable situations, it’s natural to want to pray them away. But trials and tests are necessary for us to become all that God created us to be. Let God mold you through the difficulty, and He'll release a new level of blessing and breakthrough in your life.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
